message.content: {"given_definition_quality":70,"better_definition":"dictation (writing down what you hear)","sentence":"老师听写。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style scene set in a simple classroom: a teacher stands at the front, speaking slowly, while a few children quietly write in their notebooks. The environment outside the classroom windows hints at a surreal, softly colorful apocalyptic world with faded skies and distant, slightly distorted buildings. Warm, muted lighting creates a calm atmosphere. The focus is on the act of listening and writing (dictation), with the teacher and students as the main characters.","sentence_translation":"The teacher gives a dictation."}
